name: Thundering Poise
description:
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Normal Attack: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Normal Attack:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Normal Attack:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytext:
"...Tianqiu once played host to a Yaksha, four-armed and mighty."
"He came to The Chasm from afar, to the praises of the tribes."
